p: Relaxant responses of the S. raeseri extract are expressed as a value of ACh-CCh-KCl-sensitive maximal trachea smooth muscle contractions compared to 1 g of contraction force. Data are expressed as means ± SEM and are representative of at least five repeated experiments for each series of experiments. Statistical analysis was made by ANOVA or t-test. A value of p < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
